Description:
1. Check robot installation blots
2. Check robot & end effector connection bolts
3. Check motors installation bolts
4. Re-tighten if there are any loosened or unsecured bolts.

1. Open robot arms cover
2. Check robot motors installation bolts.
3. Re-tighten if there are any loosened or unsecured bolts.

1. Make sure that the cables and air tubing on the moving parts are not worn out.
2. Check the cable protecting tube on the robot is not loosen.
3. Check the cable protecting chain on the slider is not loosen.
4. Check all fans can work well (PC, robot controller, distribution area)

1. Check if there is any scratch found on the robot body and ball screw splline
2. Use air-laid paper to clean them

1. Check if there is any scratch found on the cylinder exposed piston rod. 
2. Use air-laid paper to clean it

1. Check state of corrosion inhibitor on ball screw splline & flange
2. Apply corrosion inhibitor(NOK Kluber A20 / WD-40) if needed.

1. Check timing belt(inside arm 2) tension.
2. Check timing belt(DIMM Feeder) tension.
3. Make sure that each timing belt is not worn off or cracked.

1. Move each axis by hand to check each robot axis operation.
2. Contact robot vendor if the movement is not smooth

1. Use air-laid paper to clean robot ball screw shaft 
2. Check grease state and apply grease if needed.

1. Use air-laid paper to clean pitch changer slider 
2. Use another new air-laid paper to smear the grease on the slider
3. Do not add too much grease and let it dripping

1. Use grease gun to apply grease on XY slider from grease nipple.
2. Apply grease on the slider directly if there is no grease nipple.
3. Use air-laid paper to clean the grease nipple.

1. Power on the robot
2. Push each robot arm by hand in the servo ON condition to make sure that the arm is secured/ not shaking.

1. Power on the robot
2. Make sure that no abnormal vibration or noise is caused
1. Replace the batteries in battery box for position detection with new ones.
Check the consumable parts (motors, reduction gears, belts, ball screw, body hardness, LED lamp) and replace as necessary

1. Setup illuminometer on the conveyor
2. Check if light source luminance decay lower than threshold
3. Increase light source output power untill luminance reading stay between UCL and LCL

1. Check if the camera or lightsouce is unsecured
2. Re-tighten if there are any loosened or unsecured bolts or cables.
3. Check if any obstacle or smudge on the lens of vision system
4. Use air-laid paper to clean up if needed

1. Check if the barcode reader is unsecured
2. Re-tighten if there are any loosened or unsecured bolts or cables.
3. Check if any obstacle or smudge on the barcode reader
4. Use air-laid paper to clean up if needed

1. Check pneumatic regulator pressure setting.
2. Reset if setting is out of spec
3. Check if there is any pneumatic condensate water in the cup
4. Clean up the condensate water cup

1. Check the pneumatic system filter condition
2. Replace the filter if needed

1. Use vacume cleaner to clean the PC, controller and distribution area
2. Clean the fan on the partition
3. Use air-laid paper to clean the monitor, touch panel, distribution board and penumatic board
